divs: Sighting DetailsI went outside to let my dog use the toilet before i was going to bed , i walked around the pool with him and was waiting near the door for him to hurry up with his business. i looked at my phone to see what time it was and it was 10:43 , i then looked at the moon noticing it was full or really bright and out of nowhere i saw a shooting star, i made a wish and not thinking anything out of the ordinary ,i was about to head inside and all of a sudden the shooting star stopped ... like stopped stopped !!and changed direction and shot off into the distance. I was so shocked and and confused because i swear it felt like it was observing me, i noticed that when i went inside it had already been 2 minutes since i checked my phone for the time and my cell phone screen was glitchy and had like a scatterd digital look i had to take the battery out and it went back to normal!! scared the crap out of me !!!!!!!!!!
Summary: Standing out side ,then a flash sort of like a shooting star then it paused and changed direction and then turned around
trends: There have been no other sightings in Atascocita
This sighting has never been favorited.
